settings.hero-main-richtext: Discover Uniquely Crafted Bouquets and Gifts for Any Occasion: Spread Joy with Our Online Flower Delivery Service
settings.hero__description: Experience the joy of giving with our modern floral studio. Order online and send fresh flowers, plants and gifts today.
settings.hero: flex-wrap lg:flex-nowrap lg:flex w-full justify-between items-start lg:items-stretch lg:max-h-[50vw] lg:overflow-auto lg:hide-scrollbar
settings.hero__left-col: w-full lg:w-1/2 px-4 py-10 md:p-20 lg:border-b-[1px] lg:border-brand-black lg:sticky lg:top-0 lg:h-screen lg:overflow-hidden
settings.hero__content: flex pt-4 border-t-[1px] border-brand-black md:pt-6 lg:align-center

settings.tail-hero__description: w-1/2 pl-4 content-end text-mobile-small-description md:pl-6 md:text-desktop-caption

settings.about_us__container_right_description: We are a modern local floral studio, which specializes in the design and delivery of unique bouquets. We have the best florists who carefully select each look, our studio cooperates directly with farms for growing different flowers, so we always have fresh flowers, which are collected by our florists in exquisite bouquets. We have a collection of fresh bouquets, collections of dried bouquets, house plants, as well as fragrant candles from luxury brands to create the perfect atmosphere. Make someone's day amazing by sending flowers, plants and gifts the same or next day. Ordering flowers online has never been easier.
settings.about_us__container_left: w-full px-4 py-10 border-brand-black border border-t-0 gap-4 md:p-20 lg:border-r-0
settings.about_us__container_right: w-full px-4 py-10 border-brand-black border border-t-0 md:p-20 lg:border-r-0 lg:border-l-1
settings.about_us__container_right_button_classes: text-center block text-brand-black uppercase hover:bg-brand-black hover:text-white text-mobile-button font-medium border border-brand-black pt-4 pb-[14px] px-6 tracking-[0.025em] w-full md:w-[175px] md:h-[56px] md:tracking-[0.03em] md:text-desktop-button

settings.title: Stylish bouquets by florists
settings.text: The task of the organization, especially the strengthening and development of the structure allows us to assess the importance of the directions of progressive development.
settings.tw-why-choose-us__benefit-block__content: py-10 px-4 gap-4 flex flex-col md:p-20 md:gap-4 border-b-[1px] lg:border-l-[1px] border-brand-black

settings.title: On-time delivery
settings.text: Never miss a moment with our on-time flower delivery service. Our couriers will deliver your bouquet personally, without boxes, to ensure it arrives in perfect condition. Trust us to deliver your thoughtful gift reliably.
settings.tw-why-choose-us__benefit-block__content: py-10 px-4 gap-4 flex flex-col md:p-20 md:gap-4 border-b-[1px] lg:border-l-[1px] border-brand-black

settings.title: Safe payment
settings.text: You can feel secure when placing an order with us, as we use industry-standard security measures to protect your payment information. Your transaction will be safe and hassle-free, so you can shop with confidence.
settings.tw-why-choose-us__benefit-block__content: py-10 px-4 gap-4 flex flex-col md:p-20 md:gap-4 border-b-[1px] lg:border-l-[1px] border-brand-black

settings.title: Subscription by your needs
settings.text: With our subscription service tailored to your specific needs, you can enjoy the convenience of having beautiful bouquets delivered straight to your door at regular intervals. Our flexible service is perfect for busy individuals or those who want to ensure they always have fresh flowers on hand. You'll save time and money with this hassle-free solution to your floral needs.
settings.tw-why-choose-us__benefit-block__content: py-10 px-4 gap-4 flex flex-col md:p-20 md:gap-4 border-b-[1px] lg:border-l-[1px] border-brand-black

settings.title: SERVICE
settings.heading: Flower Subscriptions
settings.paragraph: Experience the convenience and savings of regular flower deliveries with our flexible subscription service - up to 30% more profitable than one-time purchases.
